item.title: SCAD Savannah Film Fest: Jennifer Lopez Will Receive Virtuoso Award, Guest on Live Episode of THR’s ‘Awards Chatter’ Pod
item.description: The trailblazing multi-hyphenate is currently generating best supporting actress Oscar buzz for her performance in Bill Condon’s movie musical ‘Kiss of the Spider Woman.’

item.title: Jennifer Lopez Laughs Off Wardrobe Malfunction During Concert: “I’m Glad I Had Underwear On”
item.description: After her skirt fell off, she tossed it into the crowd and told the lucky fan to keep it.
